title.rendered: Tastebudz Kush Mints Strain Photoperiod Seeds

content.rendered:
🌿 Kush Mints Strain – Feminized Photoperiod Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

Cool, Potent, and Perfectly Balanced

The Kush Mints strain is a high-THC hybrid born from the elite pairing of Alien Mints x Bubblegum Kush. Developed by Tastebudz Syndicate, this powerhouse photoperiod strain offers a smooth, minty flavour with a euphoric, full-body buzz that satisfies recreational and therapeutic collectors alike.

With THC levels exceeding 26%, Kush Mints delivers a heavy hit wrapped in a cool, creamy terp profile. It flowers in just 8–9 weeks and thrives in both indoor and outdoor environments—making it as productive as it is potent.

Please Note: These feminized photoperiod seeds are sold strictly as adult souvenirs. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued license.

📊 Kush Mints Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Alien Mints x Bubblegum Kush
Strain Type Balanced Hybrid
Flowering Time 8–9 Weeks
Indoor Yield 500–650g/m² (info only)
Outdoor Yield 170–220g/plant (in ideal climates)
THC Content Up to 26%+
Flavours Mint cookie, pine, creamy sweetness
Aromas Minty fresh, earthy pine, herbal spice
Effects Relaxing, euphoric, mood-boosting, sensual

🌟 Why Kush Mints Strain Is a Cult Classic

  • Elevated Potency: THC levels over 26% for a powerful, long-lasting high.
  • Fresh, Sweet Flavour: Mint cookie meets pine in a uniquely refreshing terp blend.
  • Therapeutic Versatility: Often sought out for relief from stress, insomnia, and low mood.
  • Reliable Yields: High returns with short flowering time and resilient structure.
  • Collector’s Favourite: Balanced effects, bag appeal, and rich genetics make it a keeper.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About Kush Mints Strain

1. What is the Kush Mints strain?
The Kush Mints strain is a hybrid created from Alien Mints and Bubblegum Kush, offering high THC, minty-sweet flavours, and balanced mental and physical effects.

2. Is Kush Mints indica or sativa?
Kush Mints is a well-balanced hybrid, providing both uplifting euphoria and deep relaxation without overwhelming sedation.

3. What does Kush Mints strain taste like?
Expect a refreshing mint cookie flavour with notes of pine and creamy sweetness—a standout for fans of dessert or menthol strains.

4. What are the effects of Kush Mints strain?
Kush Mints is known for its relaxing, euphoric, and mood-boosting qualities. It may help ease depression, insomnia, muscle spasms, and enhance sensuality.

5. How long does Kush Mints take to flower?
This photoperiod strain flowers in just 8–9 weeks, offering high yields and excellent quality with minimal fuss.

🛒 Add Kush Mints to Your Collection Today

With its standout flavour, ultra-high THC, and therapeutic edge, the Kush Mints strain is an essential addition to any seed collector’s lineup. Balanced, bold, and bred for performance—this is one mint you won’t forget.

Buying, selling, or trading feminized seeds in the UK is legally permissible, whether obtained domestically or from other European countries.

However, it is essential to research and comply with local laws and regulations before placing an order.

The Kush Mints strain is perfect for those battling depression, insomnia, or muscle spasms, with yields of 1.64 – 2.14 oz/ft² indoors and 5 – 7 oz/plant outdoors.

Embrace the classic, therapeutic, and aromatic journey with Kush Mints.
